name: Warcraft 3 Saved Game
summary: Learn about .W3Z files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Multiplayer games (such as Battle.net matches) can be saved as well. However, each user must load the saved game for the match to resume correctly.

description: A W3Z file is a mission save created by Warcraft III and the Warcraft III Frozen Throne expansion pack. It saves a player's current progress and allows the game to be loaded and continued at a later time.
